entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
